name: Retainage Receivable
description: Retainage held by owners on progress billings

name: Prepaid Insurance
description: Prepaid general liability / workers comp / builders risk

name: Underbillings (CIP)
description: Costs in excess of billings — WIP asset

name: Accounts Payable
description: Trade payables to vendors and subs

name: Accrued Payroll
description: Wages / salaries / taxes accrued but not paid

name: Sales Tax Payable
description: Arizona TPT and NM GRT collected

name: Overbillings (CIP)
description: Billings in excess of costs — WIP liability

name: Equipment Rental Revenue
description: Internal and external equipment rental income

name: Vehicle Expense
description: Fuel / maintenance / registration for non-job vehicles
